description: FIRST MOTION for Extension of Time to File Doctor's letter confirming ear injury., FIRST MOTION for Reconsideration re 508 Order on Motion for Recusal, Order on Letter Motion,,, Order on Motion to Modify Conditions of Release, Order on Motion to Vacate (2255),,,,, Order on Motion for Reconsideration,,,,,,,,,,,,, .( Return Date set for 3/7/2025 at 05:00 PM.), FIRST LETTER MOTION addressed to Judge Paul A. Engelmayer from Ari Teman dated 2025-03-04 re: Re: United States v. Teman, Request for Adjustment of Deadlines to Comply with Recent Order, Permission to Reside in Israel in accordance with religious beliefs and Constitution, and Additional Relief -- Ordering AUSA Guttwillig to issue a sworn statement as to why he made repeatedly false statements as to Mr. Teman's medical conditions while in the BOP effecting the denial of necessary care. --- Notice that two advanced artificial intelligence agents (Grok 3 and ChatGPT) say with certainty that Paul Engelmayer's Ruling at 138 and Appeal Ruling are by same author (In Groks words, These ticsverbatim phrases, punctuation quirks, and rhetorical habitsconfirm Engelmayers authorship.) ., FIRST MOTION to Compel AUSA Guttwillig to issue a sworn statement as to why he made repeatedly false statements as to Mr. Teman's medical conditions while in the BOP effecting the denial of necessary care, resulting in Teman being in agony at a level of 9/10 for months, as confirmed by Mount Sinai and Akumin imaging and entirely separate and independent doctors.( Return Date set for 3/7/2025 at 05:00 PM.) Document filed by Ari Teman. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit Grok says Paul Engelmayer's Ruling at 138 and Appeal Ruling are by same author, # 2 Exhibit ChatGPT says Paul Engelmayer's Ruling at 138 and Appeal Ruling are by same author, # 3 Exhibit As was already filed in Docket 505, the Judge is fully aware this injury occurred in January and previous flight logs are therefore an irrelevant distraction:)(Teman, Ari) (Entered: 03/04/2025)
